thread.title: Playboy Magazine to No Longer Publish Nude Photos
thread.title_full: Playboy Magazine to No Longer Publish Nude Photos - WSJ

author: Ezequiel Minaya
title: Playboy Magazine to No Longer Publish Nude Photos
text:
Playboy Enterprises Inc., which helped usher in the sexual revolution but has stumbled in the digital era, said it no longer would publish nude photos in its flagship magazine, which built its reputation on spreads featuring pop-culture icons such as Marilyn Monroe, Farrah Fawcett and Madonna.
Playboy, which already has reconfigured its website to make it “safe for work,” said it would unveil a redesign to its magazine with the March... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
